qualityFirst.heading: Precision starts with perfect labels
qualityFirst.description: In manufacturing, a false positive stops the line. A missed defect ships to customers. That's why we obsess over annotation quality — multi-reviewer consensus, expert validation, and golden test sets that catch edge cases before they reach production.

pillars.title: Multi-reviewer workflows
pillars.description: Every label is validated by multiple experts. Consensus ensures accuracy.

pillars.title: Golden test datasets
pillars.description: Benchmark every model version against curated edge cases before deployment.

pillars.title: Per-defect metrics
pillars.description: Track precision and recall for each defect type. No blind spots.

pillars.title: Human-level benchmarks
pillars.description: Compare model performance against your best inspectors. Prove ROI.

evaluation.heading: Test before you trust
evaluation.description: Every model is evaluated against curated test scenarios before deployment. Track per-defect metrics, compare to human baselines, and catch regressions early.

goldenTestSets.title: Golden Test Sets
goldenTestSets.subtitle: Curated edge cases
goldenTestSets.description: Build test datasets with your hardest cases — lighting variations, rare defects, borderline calls. Every model version runs against them before promotion.

perClassMetrics.title: Per-Class Metrics
perClassMetrics.subtitle: No blind spots
perClassMetrics.description: Overall accuracy hides weak spots. Track precision, recall, and F1 for each defect type. Know exactly where your model excels and where it struggles.

humanBaseline.title: Human Baseline
humanBaseline.subtitle: Prove the ROI
humanBaseline.description: Have your inspectors label the same test set. Compare model performance to human accuracy. Quantify the improvement you're getting.

features: Search by location, date, or equipment

hero.headline: Precision agriculture built on <highlight>geo-referenced data</highlight>
hero.subheadline: Manage massive drone datasets with GPS metadata intact. Train models on multi-spectral imagery. Validate with agronomist expertise.

dataLayer.heading: Built for drone-scale imagery
dataLayer.description: Agricultural imagery is different. Orthomosaics stretch into gigabytes. Every pixel has GPS coordinates. Multi-spectral bands reveal what RGB cannot. Picsellia handles it all — no compromises on data fidelity.

capabilities.title: Orthomosaic support
capabilities.description: Upload multi-gigabyte stitched maps. Automatic tiling for efficient viewing and annotation.

capabilities.title: GPS metadata extraction
capabilities.description: Automatic parsing of EXIF coordinates, altitude, heading. Every annotation is geo-referenced.

capabilities.title: Multi-spectral layers
capabilities.description: RGB, NIR, thermal, NDVI — all linked to the same capture. Switch views during annotation.

capabilities.title: Field & plot hierarchy
capabilities.description: Organize imagery by farm, field, plot, and season. Query across time to track changes.

dataIngestion.title: Data Ingestion
dataIngestion.tilingFooter: Original file preserved. Tiles generated for efficient annotation.

humanInTheLoop.heading: Agronomist expertise in every prediction
humanInTheLoop.description: AI spots the patterns. Experts confirm the diagnosis. This loop ensures your disease detection and yield models reach the precision agriculture demands.

expertReview.title: Expert Review Workflows
expertReview.subtitle: Agronomists validate AI predictions
expertReview.description: Route low-confidence detections to your agronomists. They confirm disease identifications, correct misclassifications, and add domain knowledge the model lacks.

activeLearning.title: Active Learning
activeLearning.subtitle: Smart sampling for maximum impact
activeLearning.description: Not all samples need expert review. Picsellia identifies the edge cases — unusual disease presentations, ambiguous growth stages, rare conditions — and routes only those for annotation.
activeLearning.footer: Focus expert time on samples that improve model accuracy most

hero.headline: AI that keeps up with <highlight>changing waste streams</highlight>
hero.subheadline: Packaging changes. Materials evolve. Your AI should too. Build waste sorting models that continuously learn and adapt.

challenge.heading: Your training data is already outdated
challenge.description: Static models don't work in waste management. New packaging hits shelves every week. Seasonal products come and go. Brand redesigns happen overnight. Your sorting AI needs to adapt — or accuracy plummets.

items.title: New packaging every week
items.description: Brands redesign, seasonal editions launch, new materials enter the market. Your model trained on last year's packaging is already outdated.

items.title: Regional variations
items.description: Products in France differ from Germany. Local brands, different recycling symbols, varying material compositions across regions.

items.title: Mixed & damaged items
items.description: Crushed cans, torn labels, multi-layer packaging. Real-world waste looks nothing like pristine training images.

items.title: Model drift over time
items.description: A model that worked great in January underperforms by June. Without monitoring, you won't know until sorting quality drops.

failureStat.title: of waste AI projects fail
failureStat.subtitle: due to model degradation over time

warning.title: Without continuous learning
warning.description: Your sorting line misclassifies thousands of items daily

solution.heading: Continuous learning, not one-time training
solution.description: Picsellia creates a closed loop: monitor production, catch drift, retrain, and redeploy — automatically.

steps.title: Deploy & Monitor
steps.description: Models run on your sorting line. Every prediction is logged with confidence scores.

steps.title: Detect Drift
steps.description: When confidence drops or new item types appear, the system flags them automatically.

steps.title: Smart Labeling
steps.description: Low-confidence samples are routed to human reviewers. AI pre-labels, experts validate.

steps.title: Retrain & Redeploy
steps.description: Updated models are trained on new data and deployed without downtime.

solution.loopMessage: Continuous loop — models improve every week
